Wo jiang rang ni siqu, jiang ba ni rong sheng dao wo zheli lai, jiang chengqing bu xinyang zhe dui ni de wangyan [ru er sa shi an la zhizi de wangyan], jiang shi zhuisui ni de ren you yu bu xinyang zhe, zhidao fuhuo ri [zhu]. Ranhou, nimen dou jiang gui dao wo zheli lai, wo jiang wei nimen panjue nimen suo fenqi de.
